name: 炼金：洛温暗影笼罩
description: 炼金：洛温暗影笼罩共30张卡牌，将于2026年2月4日上线万智牌：竞技场。感谢欧琳的吟颂、六宜散人翻译，以及轻脚制作中文卡图。

cards.name: The Grand Goatnapper
cards.text:
Spells you cast have `affinity for Goats`.
{T}: Target non-Goat creature `perpetually` becomes a Goat in addition to its other types. Then `conjure` a card named `Goatnap:0` into your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
FLAVOR
"Fear the boggart in sheep's clothing"
—Emerging kithkin proverb
cards.zhs_text:
你施放的咒语具有`山羊共鸣`异能。
{T}：目标非山羊生物`永久`成为山羊，且仍具有原本类别。然后将一张名称为`顺手牵羊:0`的牌`幻变`进你的手牌。只能于法术时机起动。
FLAVOR
「小心披着羊皮的波尬。」
～洁英新谚

cards.name: Providence of Night
cards.text:
`Protection from monocolored`
Whenever you cast a spell with hybrid mana in its mana cost, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
FLAVOR
"I have seen beyond the moonlight. I have seen the infinite night. It does not creep, it has no need. It is already here."
—The Listener's Lament
cards.zhs_text:
`反单色保护`
每当你施放法术力费用中包含混血法术力的咒语时，将它复制。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。
FLAVOR
「我已窥透月华，也已望穿永夜。它不匍行，无需匍行。它已降临。」
～聆者悲歌

cards.name: Limitless Rekindling
cards.text:
`Conjure` a random instant or sorcery card from the Lorwyn Eclipsed expansion into exile. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
`Storm`
cards.zhs_text:
将一张来自洛温：暗影笼罩系列的随机瞬间或法术牌`幻变`进放逐区。直到回合结束，你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。
`风暴`

cards.name: Thorna and Twigtooth
cards.text:
Thorna and Twigtooth enters with two -1/-1 counters on it.
Whenever Thorna and Twigtooth attacks, remove all counters from target creature you control. Each opponent loses X life, you gain X life, and the topmost creature card in your library `perpetually` gets +X/+X, where X is the number of counters removed this way.
cards.zhs_text:
索娜与枝牙进场时上面有两个-1/-1指示物。
每当索娜与枝牙攻击时，从目标由你操控的生物上移去所有指示物。每位对手各失去X点生命，你获得X点生命，且你牌库最顶上的生物牌`永久`得+X/+X，X为以此法移去的指示物数量。

cards.name: Aquatic Subtlety
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Blue creature cards in your hand `perpetually` gain "`Evoke`—Exile a blue card from your hand."
cards.zhs_text: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。你手上的蓝色生物牌`永久`获得「`呼魂`～从你手上放逐一张蓝色牌。」

cards.name: Pep, Raucous Raider
cards.text:
`Trample`, `Haste`
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. It `perpetually` becomes an artifact if it's a nonland permanent card. Until end of turn, you may play the exiled card.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add three mana of any one color.
cards.zhs_text:
`践踏`，`敏捷`
每当一个由你操控的生物对牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐该牌手的牌库顶牌。若它是非地永久物牌，则它`永久`成为神器。直到回合结束，你可以施放所放逐的牌。
{T}，牺牲一个神器：加三点任意颜色的单色法术力。

cards.name: Infestation
cards.text:
`Wither`
When this creature enters, `conjure` a card named `Blowfly Infestation:0` onto the battlefield. Then put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.
`Evoke`—{2}{B}{B}, Pay 2 life.
cards.zhs_text:
`干枯`
当此生物进场时，将一张名称为`绿蝇侵扰:0`的牌`幻变`进战场。然后在每个生物上各放置一个-1/-1指示物。
`呼魂`～{2}{B}{B}，支付2点生命。

cards.name: Kithkin Brinefarer
cards.text:
Whenever a Kithkin card is put into your hand from your library, `conjure` a duplicate of that card into your hand.
Whenever you attack, Kithkin creature cards in your hand `perpetually` get +1/+1.
cards.zhs_text:
每当一张洁英牌从你的牌库置于你手上时，将该牌的一张副本`幻变`进你手上。
每当你攻击时，你手上的洁英生物牌`永久`得+1/+1。

cards.name: Salacinder and Soot, Rascals
cards.text:
`Prowess`, `Trample`
When Salacinder and Soot enters and whenever you cast an Elemental spell, choose one —
• `Conjure` a card named `Rite of Flame:0` into your hand.
• `Conjure` a card named `Take Inventory:1` into your hand.
cards.zhs_text:
`灵技`，`践踏`
当火烬与煤烟进场与每当你施放元素咒语时，选择一项～
•将一张名称为`烈焰仪式:0`的牌`幻变`进你手上。
•将一张名称为`清点库存:1`的牌`幻变`进你手上。
